title: I NEED URGENT HELP! Tiny Client Unplayable!!
body:
https://gyazo.com/fb3aedd44a46940a853b397f4dccdeca

I cant play. I tried re-installing. what am i supposed to do im gonna get an LB

replies.body:
We typically see this happen under two conditions. 1) Your native display resolution is really high. 2) Your input file saved server-side is corrupt and needs to be reset. Let's try resetting your input file that stores your League display resolution and give it a quick reset. 

First, **log into the League Client** then navigate to your config folder, which should be found in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, hop into a custom match alone to see if the reset went through and if your display looks normal again. Let me know if this helped!
